detail_desc: Skirt in sequin-embroidered mesh with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Draped stand-up collar with a roll edge, a seam under the bust with detachable ties, gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Dress in a crêpe weave with a bead-embroidered collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Tapered waist with a seam and gently flared skirt. Lined skirt.

Straight-cut, double-breasted coat in heavily draping woven fabric with notch lapels and concealed press-studs at the front. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Suede ankle boots with a concealed zip in one side and covered block heels. Satin linings, twill insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.

Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets at the front. Long raglan sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, a frill-trimmed yoke at the back and an embroidered back section in woven fabric.
Pull-on trousers in lightweight, washed cotton denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets with a small frill trim, and ribbed hems.
Checked cotton flannel shirt with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, a narrow collar and two flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap and a slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, embroidered sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the back, a sweetheart neckline and a drawstring down the front to create a draped effect. Long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the cuffs. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Calf-length, batik-patterned skirt in Tencel™ lyocell with ties at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Two-button jacket in a cotton Oxford weave with a chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Vest top in airy, ribbed jersey made from a soft silk and viscose blend with a low-cut neckline at the back.
Wide dress woven in a viscose blend with a collar, V-neck, low dropped shoulders and buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut with tiers and a flare to the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Gloves in jersey with reflective details. Reinforced palms for a better grip, and an adjustable tab and hook and loop fastening at the top. Touchscreen-compatible material on the thumb and index finger. Fleece lining.

Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill. High waist with belt loops, a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and wide legs with pleats at the top and hems for added volume. Close-fitting cuffs at the hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Scalloped V-neck, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a crocheted lace trim at the hem.

Ankle-length dungarees in twill made from a linen and cotton blend with adjustable straps that fasten to the back of the waistband. Seam at the waist with pleats at the top, a low crotch, diagonal side pockets, a zip in one side and legs with creases.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Court shoes with pointed toes and a bow on the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Loose-fitting, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with elastication at the top. Short sleeves with an opening and ties, and a rounded hem.
Sandals in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles and a hook and loop tab around the ankles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Tapered legs with wide ribbing at the hems.
Strapless bandeau bra in lace. Jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Short, A-line skirt in sturdy, textured jersey with a high waist, zip fly and button and large patch front pockets. Unlined.

Jacket woven in a cotton blend with a zip down the front and stand-up collar with buttons. Loose yoke at the back, open side pockets, an inner pocket with a button, and wide elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Triangle bikini top with lined, padded cups, removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Wide elastic hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Nightshirt in a soft cotton weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem. Trims in a contrasting colour. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey with wide elastic at the hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jersey fancy dress skirt in the shape of a fishtail with a shimmering metallic scale print. Short at the front and lined inside.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front and an opening at the hem. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Metal Alice band with glittery ears.

Short anorak in nylon with a shimmering metallic finish and drawstring hood. Zip at the top, yoke and kangaroo pocket at the front, an elastic drawstring at the sides and wide elastication at the cuffs.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a high collar, large buttons over the shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The jumper can also be worn as a gilet by unbuttoning the sleeves.

Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Ties at one side and wide flounces down the front and at the hem. Lined.
V-neck dress in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester and polyamide content of the dress is recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length washed denim jeans in a straight fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge hems.
Leggings in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length dress in airy viscose with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and dolman sleeves.
Straight-cut cardigan in fine-knit long-staple cotton with a silver-plated zip down the front. Ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in a soft fine knit with wide shoulder straps, a sweetheart neckline, drawstring at the front and a seam and flounce at the hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and short slits at the hems.
Gloves with suede uppers and leather underneath. Knitted lining.

Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Mesh sports bag with two handles. Size 15x40x43 cm.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
5-pocket skirt in stretch denim with hard-worn details, visible sequins in one pocket and an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y). Zip fly with a button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Cropped top in satin with a sweatshirt fabric, a drawstring hood and zip at the top lined in mesh, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long dress with a lace bodice and pleated chiffon skirt. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and scallop-edged cap sleeves. Concealed zip in one side and a seam with a grosgrain trim at the waist. Partly lined bodice and lined skirt.
Small shopper in soft suede with handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and large outer compartment. Unlined. Size 10x20x23 cm.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Long-sleeved top in printed jersey with a lined hood and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Mittens in a soft wool rib knit with a jersey lining. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
